thread.title: Soap Spoilers: A fire breaks out in Neighbours and Marilyn has an accident in Home and Away - Neighbours Soaps
thread.title_full: Soap Spoilers: A fire breaks out in Neighbours and Marilyn has an accident in Home and Away - Neighbours News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Sophie Dainty
title: Soap Spoilers: A fire breaks out in Neighbours and Marilyn has an accident in Home and Away - Neighbours Soaps
text: Disaster will strike on Neighbours next month as a fire breaks out at Erinsborough High, leaving a number of Ramsay Street residents in danger. The blaze will start on the day of a huge protest at the school, which sees the locals stage a sleepout in the building after hearing that the council plans to close it down. Brad Willis (Kip Gamblin) is one character at the centre of the drama when he is left with a terrible decision to make after realising that both his estranged wife Terese and his new lover Lauren have failed to escape the burning building. © Channel 5Brad returns to the burning building © Channel 5Brad insists on returning to the burning building Following their discovery that a fire was spreading, Lauren will attempt to follow Brad out of danger, but instead decides to head back to get a terrified Terese.Although Lauren does her best to persuade Terese to move out to safety, a massive explosion soon rocks the corridor, prompting the lockers to fall down and pin both women to the ground. Realising that Lauren and Terese are still trapped inside, Brad bravely decides to head back to the place where he saw them last and eventually finds them unconscious. © Channel 5Lauren and Terese are pinned under lockers © Channel 5Terese's life is in danger Struggling with smoke inhalation, Brad tries to pick up both women but when he is unable to manage, he has to make a split second decision over who to take out first.Brad decides to carry Lauren out, leaving an injured Terese on the floor as the fire draws closer. Will Terese survive the blaze, and will she ever forgive Brad for his decision if she does? © Channel 5Brad pulls Lauren out of the fire © Channel 5Brad and Karl carry Lauren © Channel 5Lauren suffers serious burns from the fire Neighbours airs these scenes on Tuesday November 3 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5. Neighbours teases dramatic fire week with tense Brad Willis promoNeighbours spoilers: First look at the Erinsborough High fire as Kip Gamblin hosts behind the scenes videoNeighbours spoilers: New backstage video shows Paige and Tyler trapped in school fireNeighbours producer plans to bring in Brad's son Ned one day: 'We are keeping him in reserve'Toadie Rebecchi is another character whose life will be left hanging in the balance during the fire, after Sheila Canning makes a life or death decision of her own.Toadie (Ryan Maloney) was left paralysed earlier in the year, but he will be left with no choice but to abandon the wheelchair he now uses when the explosion rips through the school.As a determined Toadie tries to escape unaided, he soon realises that he is completely out of his depth and with the smoke increasing, he begs someone to help him. © Channel 5Sheila wrestles with guilt © Channel 5Sheila wrestles with guilt © Channel 5The fire rages around Toadie However, when Sheila sees the desperate predicament he is in, she panics and flees, choosing to save herself and leave him stranded.While Sheila wrestles with the guilt of choosing to save herself over Toadie, it's up to Sonya to find her husband and bring him to safety.Luckily, Sonya receives unexpected help from Steph Scully, who shouldn't have even been at the school in the first place. As the pair work together to try and get Toadie out of the building, could this be a turning point for Steph at last? © Channel 5Sonya finds Toadie amongst the debris © Channel 5Sonya tries to free Toadie © Channel 5Steph and Sonya drag Toadie to safety Neighbours airs these scenes on Tuesday November 3 and Wednesday November 4 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5.Neighbours star Eve Morey teases fire drama: 'Sonya panics over Toadie'Neighbours star Ryan Moloney on Toadie's paralysis: 'It could be a permanent way of life'Neighbours returnee Carla Bonner: 'I'll bring more old faces back to Ramsay Street'Read more Neighbours spoilers and newsOver on Home and Away, Marilyn Chambers's life will hang in the balance when she is electrocuted in a freak accident.The incident occurs after troubled teenager Hunter King breaks into the Diner and steals the safe.During the break-in, some water manages to escape onto the floor with an electricity cable nearby and disaster then strikes when an oblivious Marilyn turns up for her usual shift the following morning. © Channel 5Marilyn is electrocuted at the diner As Marilyn (Emily Symons) starts to clean the floor, she is unaware of the exposed wires and suddenly receives a violent jolt which sends her flying across the floor.When Leah and Roo turn up later, they are horrified to find Marilyn unconscious and immediately rush her to hospital.Marilyn's husband John struggles to cope upon hearing the news and is left further devastated when Summer Bay's new doctor James informs him that they will have to put Marilyn in an induced coma.The residents do their best to rally around a distressed John in his time of need, but will Marilyn pull through? © Channel 5Leah and Roo find Marilyn unconscious © Channel 5James discovers that Marilyn has been electrocuted Home and Away airs these scenes on Tuesday November 3 and Wednesday November 4 at 1.15pm and 6pm on Channel 5.Home and Away spoilers: Marilyn Chambers to be electrocuted in freak accident Home and Away spoilers: John and Marilyn Palmer's marriage to hit the rocksHome and Away star Emily Symons has given birth to a baby boyAlso ahead on Summer Bay, Phoebe Nicholson will finally discover who the father of her unborn baby is.Phoebe's life was recently thrown into turmoil when she discovered she was pregnant, shortly after calling time on her relationship with Kyle Braxton and starting a new one with Ash.As she prepares to to find out the results of the paternity test, Phoebe (Isabella Giovinazzo) does her best to reassure an anxious Ash that the results won't change how she feels about him. © Channel 5Phoebe, Ash and Kyle wait for news However, after it is revealed that Kyle is the father, all three of them are left in shock as they head home to talk their increasingly complicated situation through.Although Phoebe does her best to persuade Ash that they can make it work, he devastates her by admitting that he can't do it anymore and that their relationship is over. Will she be able to change his mind, or is this the end for the couple? © Channel 5Kyle is the father of Phoebe's baby Home and Away airs these scenes on Monday November 2 at 1.15pm and 6pm on Channel 5.Home and Away confirms a new pregnancy storylineHome and Away: Phoebe Nicholson to feel the strain as baby paternity is revealedHome and Away spoilers: Phoebe Nicholson gets some unexpected newsRead more Home and Away spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on EastEnders' Halloween special, Nikhil's Emmerdale return, the Nightingale family's arrival in Hollyoaks and a new romance story for Mary in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4565610458001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14565610458001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4565610458001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4565610458001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14565610458001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4565610458001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
